001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.test;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.ChainTipPublisher;
005
006/**
007 *  Useful for testing.
008 */
009public class TestChainTipPublishers {
010    /**
011     * @return A {@link ChainTipPublisher} that never emits items and never closes.
012     */
013    public static ChainTipPublisher never() {
014        return ChainTipPublisher.of(Flowable.never());
015    }
016}
